body:
Hello, I was wondering if this cool application could be included in HB. 
I apologize if what it does can already be performed through the daysim components, I just now started using them in actual cases. If this is not very easy or probable to happen soon, is there a way to export my .rad scene with HB? Again I sincerely apologize if that is what happens when I press true in daylight simulation. Kind regards, Theodore.
